11#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format.h"
12
13#include <memory>
14
15#include "absl/types/variant.h"
16#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format_h264.h"
17#ifndef DISABLE_H265
18#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format_h265.h"
19#endif
20#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format_video_generic.h"
21#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format_vp8.h"
22#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_format_vp9.h"
23#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/rtp_packetizer_av1.h"
24#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/h264/include/h264_globals.h"
25#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/vp8/include/vp8_globals.h"
26#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/vp9/include/vp9_globals.h"
27#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
28
29namespace webrtc {
30
31std::unique_ptr<RtpPacketizer> RtpPacketizer::Create(
32 absl::optional<VideoCodecType> type,
33 rtc::ArrayView<const uint8_t> payload,
34 PayloadSizeLimits limits,
35 // Codec-specific details.
36 const RTPVideoHeader& rtp_video_header) {
37 if (!type) {
38 // Use raw packetizer.
39 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerGeneric>(payload, limits);
40 }
41
42 switch (*type) {
43 case kVideoCodecH264: {
44 const auto& h264 =
45 absl::get<RTPVideoHeaderH264>(rtp_video_header.video_type_header);
46 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerH264>(payload, limits,
47 h264.packetization_mode);
48 }
49 case kVideoCodecVP8: {
50 const auto& vp8 =
51 absl::get<RTPVideoHeaderVP8>(rtp_video_header.video_type_header);
52 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerVp8>(payload, limits, vp8);
53 }
54 case kVideoCodecVP9: {
55 const auto& vp9 =
56 absl::get<RTPVideoHeaderVP9>(rtp_video_header.video_type_header);
57 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerVp9>(payload, limits, vp9);
58 }
59 case kVideoCodecAV1:
60 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerAv1>(
61 payload, limits, rtp_video_header.frame_type,
62 rtp_video_header.is_last_frame_in_picture);
63#ifndef DISABLE_H265
64 case kVideoCodecH265: {
65 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerGeneric>(payload, limits,
66 rtp_video_header);
67 }
68#endif
69 default: {
70 return std::make_unique<RtpPacketizerGeneric>(payload, limits,
71 rtp_video_header);
72 }
73 }
74}
75
76std::vector<int> RtpPacketizer::SplitAboutEqually(
77 int payload_len,
78 const PayloadSizeLimits& limits) {
79 RTC_DCHECK_GT(payload_len, 0);
80 // First or last packet larger than normal are unsupported.
81 RTC_DCHECK_GE(limits.first_packet_reduction_len, 0);
82 RTC_DCHECK_GE(limits.last_packet_reduction_len, 0);
83
84 std::vector<int> result;
85 if (limits.max_payload_len >=
86 limits.single_packet_reduction_len + payload_len) {
87 result.push_back(payload_len);
88 return result;
89 }
90 if (limits.max_payload_len - limits.first_packet_reduction_len < 1 ||
91 limits.max_payload_len - limits.last_packet_reduction_len < 1) {
92 // Capacity is not enough to put a single byte into one of the packets.
93 return result;
94 }
95 // First and last packet of the frame can be smaller. Pretend that it's
96 // the same size, but we must write more payload to it.
97 // Assume frame fits in single packet if packet has extra space for sum
98 // of first and last packets reductions.
99 int total_bytes = payload_len + limits.first_packet_reduction_len +
100 limits.last_packet_reduction_len;
101 // Integer divisions with rounding up.
102 int num_packets_left =
103 (total_bytes + limits.max_payload_len - 1) / limits.max_payload_len;
104 if (num_packets_left == 1) {
105 // Single packet is a special case handled above.
106 num_packets_left = 2;
107 }
108
109 if (payload_len < num_packets_left) {
110 // Edge case where limits force to have more packets than there are payload
111 // bytes. This may happen when there is single byte of payload that can't be
112 // put into single packet if
113 // first_packet_reduction + last_packet_reduction >= max_payload_len.
114 return result;
115 }
116
117 int bytes_per_packet = total_bytes / num_packets_left;
118 int num_larger_packets = total_bytes % num_packets_left;
119 int remaining_data = payload_len;
120
121 result.reserve(num_packets_left);
122 bool first_packet = true;
123 while (remaining_data > 0) {
124 // Last num_larger_packets are 1 byte wider than the rest. Increase
125 // per-packet payload size when needed.
126 if (num_packets_left == num_larger_packets)
127 ++bytes_per_packet;
128 int current_packet_bytes = bytes_per_packet;
129 if (first_packet) {
130 if (current_packet_bytes > limits.first_packet_reduction_len + 1)
131 current_packet_bytes -= limits.first_packet_reduction_len;
132 else
133 current_packet_bytes = 1;
134 }
135 if (current_packet_bytes > remaining_data) {
136 current_packet_bytes = remaining_data;
137 }
138 // This is not the last packet in the whole payload, but there's no data
139 // left for the last packet. Leave at least one byte for the last packet.
140 if (num_packets_left == 2 && current_packet_bytes == remaining_data) {
141 --current_packet_bytes;
142 }
143 result.push_back(current_packet_bytes);
144
145 remaining_data -= current_packet_bytes;
146 --num_packets_left;
147 first_packet = false;
148 }
149
150 return result;
151}
152
153} // namespace webrtc
